entry.content: A fast, lightweight WhatsApp bot powered Baileys Web API

entry.title: DharamveerSinghGrewal/easy-docs: Easy-Docs is a lightweight and intuitive real-time collaborative text editor designed for seamless document creation and editing. Built with modern web technologies, it enables multiple users to collaborate simultaneously with live updates. Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.
entry.content: Easy-Docs is a lightweight and intuitive real-time collaborative text editor designed for seamless document creation and editing. Built with modern web technologies, it enables multiple users to collaborate simultaneously with live updates. Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.

entry.title: Kyaw-Zin-Thant/gha-builder-cli: A lightweight and interactive CLI tool for generating custom GitHub Actions workflows. Supports multiple languages (Java with Maven, Ruby, Node.js) and includes tailored CI/CD templates to streamline your DevOps processes.
entry.content: A lightweight and interactive CLI tool for generating custom GitHub Actions workflows. Supports multiple languages (Java with Maven, Ruby, Node.js) and includes tailored CI/CD templates to streamline your DevOps processes.

entry.title: rohitghosh1763/IronCloak: IronCloak is a lightweight password manager focused on simplicity and security. It encrypts your credentials with robust algorithms and stores them securely in a MongoDB database. Built for reliability without unnecessary features, IronCloak ensures your passwords are safe and accessible only to you.
entry.content: IronCloak is a lightweight password manager focused on simplicity and security. It encrypts your credentials with robust algorithms and stores them securely in a MongoDB database. Built for reliability without unnecessary features, IronCloak ensures your passwords are safe and accessible only to you.

entry.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
entry.content: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
